page.title: 08THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE.
page.content: The bus service is the only commercial communication to Oban apart from the telephone. The bus is more than a means of transport as Johnnie the bus driver takes supplies for the shop and prescriptions for the old age pensioners and people who are ill. Next school year I will be on the bus every school day because I will be going to Oban High School which is the closest secondary school to our to us. There is a rumour that the bus service will stop because the special grants might be withdrawn and then all of the children would have to stay in the school hostel during term time. I would not like that at all! Not only would it affect the school children but it would stop people who have no cars going to Oban for shopping or other business which they cannot do here in Kilchrenan.
